Package org.yamcs.parameterarchive

Class PGSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.parameterarchive.PGSegment
  • public class PGSegment
extends Object
    Parameter Group segment - keeps references to Time and Value segments for a given parameter group and segment. This class is used during the parameter archive buildup
